column5: Im not going to get long winded about this I think its a good cause and im willing to bear the pain to do it if you are interested check out the link below cheers Peter  https://secure.e2rm.com/registrant/FundraisingPage.aspx?registrationID=3690211&langPref=en-CA#&panel1-1
What exactly is the cause? I don't see it mentioned  If it a good cause I myself and a few friends will def. Chip in
I remember seeing this on channel 11 or hearing about it on CHML, extreme stuff. Are you making the run Biteme? What is the cause?

https://secure.e2rm.com/registrant/FundraisingPage.aspx?registrationID=3690211&langPref=en-CA#&panel1-1  Thanks Brian!!!!  What exactly is the cause? I don't see it mentioned  If it a good cause I myself and a few friends will def. Chip in  Its for special Olympics I think its a good cause

I remember seeing this on channel 11 or hearing about it on CHML, extreme stuff. Are you making the run Biteme? What is the cause?  I have done Spartans in the past but it was more for a marker for me to know where my physical limits were and really just money paid to a business(entry fee) I saw this come up last year and decided that it was a good fit for me. I  spent a bunch of summers when I was a kid working for special needs groups and liked it a lot . so now in my older years I can still pound the ground and sweat and do my part to help out. cheers peter
